RCR.Settings.EnableFlanking.Name: Enable Flanking
RCR.Settings.EnableFlanking.Hint: Melee attackers adjacent with an ally on the opposite side gain a bonus.
RCR.Settings.FlankingBehaviour.Name: Flanking Behaviour
RCR.Settings.FlankingBehaviour.Hint: Choose how flanking behaves — either advantage or a flat modifier.
RCR.Settings.FlankingRequiresActive.Name: Flanking Requires Active Ally
RCR.Settings.FlankingRequiresActive.Hint: The flanking ally must not be dead, prone, incapacitated, unconscious, petrified, stunned, or paralyzed.
RCR.Settings.EnableSurrounded.Name: Enable Surrounded
RCR.Settings.EnableSurrounded.Hint: Melee attackers gain a bonus when all 4 cardinal sides of the target are blocked by enemies or walls.
RCR.Settings.SurroundedBehaviour.Name: Surrounded Behaviour
RCR.Settings.SurroundedBehaviour.Hint: Choose how surrounded behaves — either advantage or a flat modifier.
RCR.Settings.EnableHighGround.Name: Enable High Ground
RCR.Settings.EnableHighGround.Hint: Ranged weapon and spell attacks gain a bonus when the attacker is at least 10 ft higher in elevation than the target.
RCR.Settings.HighGroundBehaviour.Name: High Ground Behaviour
RCR.Settings.HighGroundBehaviour.Hint: Choose how high ground behaves — either advantage or a flat modifier.
RCR.Settings.EnableConditionAdvantage.Hi: Automatically apply advantage or disadvantage from conditions (e.g. blinded, restrained, prone, invisible, poisoned, paralyzed, stunned, unconscious).
RCR.Note.Flanking.Label: Flanking
RCR.Note.Flanking.DescAdv: An ally is on the opposite side — attack has advantage.
RCR.Note.Flanking.DescMod: An ally is on the opposite side — +{value} bonus to the attack roll.
RCR.Note.Surrounded.Label: Surrounded
RCR.Note.Surrounded.DescAdv: All cardinal sides are blocked — attack has advantage.
RCR.Note.Surrounded.DescMod: All cardinal sides are blocked — +{value} bonus to the attack roll.
RCR.Note.HighGround.Label: High Ground
RCR.Note.HighGround.DescAdv: Attacker is 10+ ft above the target — attack has advantage.
RCR.Note.HighGround.DescMod: Attacker is 10+ ft above the target — +{value} bonus to the attack roll.
RCR.Reason.TargetProneMelee: Target is prone — melee has advantage.
RCR.Reason.TargetProneRanged: Target is prone — ranged has disadvantage.
